A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Rian Johnson took some big risks with The Last Jedi. I respect the heck out of him and lucasfilm for letting him do that. Some of those risks didn't pay off\, but more did than not. Nonetheless - I fully enjoyed the unexpected breathe of fresh air. Where The Force Awakens was a re-run of the same exact plot lines of the original\, this one took the story in a very different direction while still have a few well time call backs to the originals. They broke down characters you thought you knew\, and really fleshed them out and rebuilt them. I think it worked really really well\, as The Last Jedi proves triumphant.
